profileAlternative.name: Shoeb Mohammed
profileAlternative.headline: Java Software Developer @ Walmart | Expertise in Microservices, J2EE & Cloud platforms.
profileAlternative.summary:
8 years domain experience of Telecommunications, Banking & Finance, Product development and Customer support for B2B and B2C applications.
- Exposure to many programming languages, multi platform development, Web development, client / server application development, distributed application development and database design.
- Experience in developing end to end using frameworks like Spring-Boot, Thymeleaf, JavaScript, Hibernate, Angular & React.
- Experience in developing front end application using MongoDB, Express, Angular and NodeJS.
- Experience with Docker containers and orchestration platforms such as Amazon Elastic Container Service, Kubernetes, Mesos & Docker Swarm
- Experience on building Microservices with Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, Eureka Service Discovery, Ribbon, Apache camel and Restful Web Services with JAX-RS and Apache CXF.
- Experience developing messaging application using framework like JMS, ZeroMQ, ActiveMQ, Kafka & RabbitMQ.
- Proficient in JAVA/J2EE technologies, Spring, Hibernate, Struts, EJB, Servlets, JSP, Java beans, XML, XSL, DOJO, Web Services, SOAP, etc
- Experience using MVC( Model View Controller) architecture framework and various Java / J2EE design patterns.
- Experience in deploying J2EE Applications on IBM Web Sphere application server, Weblogic Application Server, Glass fish and Tomcat server.
- Expertized in using JIRA, IBM clearquest software with Jenkins and Github for real time bug tracking and issue management.
- Experience in build tools such as Apache Ant, AWS code commit, Maven and implemented Continous Integration and Continous deployment using Jenkins & Docker.
- Designed and managed public/private cloud infrastructures using Amazon Web Services(AWS) which allowed automated operations.
- Extensive experience working with RDBMS such as Oracle, MySQL, MS SQL server, DB2, Redis and NoSQL databases like MongoDB & Apache Cassandra.
- Experience with different Software Development life cycles methodologies like Agile & DevOps.

aboutAlternative.text:
8 years domain experience of Telecommunications, Banking & Finance, Product development and Customer support for B2B and B2C applications.

positions.title: Java Software Developer
positions.description:
- Worked, designed and developed Micro Services business components using Spring boot with Spring boot & Hibernate with Spring MVC flow.
- Developed Restful Services using JAX-RS with Spring Boot and Micro services Architecture to enable micro services to deploy in the cloud infrastructure.
- Used RabbitMQ as Java Messaging Service for producing and consuming data between applications.
- Automated application deployment in the cloud using Docker technology using Elastic Service
- Designed and implemented continuous integration system using Jenkins by creating python and perl scripts.
- Provided expertise and hands-on help, guidance to other engineers about cloud infrastructure, micro services container, application server configuration & docker container management.


…
see more

positions.title: Full-stack Developer
positions.description:
- Working on business, and persistence tier using Core Java (Multithreading, Collections, exceptions etc.), Spring Core, Hibernate, Apache Camel and JUnit frameworks.
- Designs, develops and implements web-based, cloud-aware Java applications to support business requirements and projects.
- Leverages Agile development including task estimation, test automation, deployment automation, and continuous integration to improve overall execution speed and code quality.
- Developed front end application with MongoDB, Express, Angular and NodeJS.
- Worked Setup of an application using Spring Cloud and creating a Docker image and deploying in minikube kubernetes environment.

…
see more

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description:
- Involved in deployment of full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) of the tracking systems Requirement gathering, Conceptual design, Analysis, Detail design, Development, System Testing, and User Acceptance
- Used Agile methodology and effectively took part in Scrum gatherings to deliver quality deliverables within time (extensively used Scrum Do for project Management).
- Performed GAP analysis on internal systems with new requirements
- Developed the DAO layer using Hibernate and used caching system for real time performance.
- Designed various applications using Multi-Threading concepts, mostly used to perform time consuming tasks in the background.
- Developed stored procedures and triggers using PL/SQL in order to calculate and update the tables to implement business logic using Oracle database.

…
see more

positions.title: Java Developer
positions.description:
-Responsible for creating Class diagrams, Sequence diagrams, Use Case diagrams, Object Model diagrams and deployment diagrams using Rational Rose.
- Deployed project based on J2EE standard architecture i.e. client tier, web tier and Business tier.
- Implemented Spring MVC for designing business layer of the Application.
- Implemented design patterns like Singleton, MVC & Front Controller.
- Good Exposure to Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) such as Webservices using Apache AXIS - SOAP engine to expose a method which parses the XML and stores the mapped fields to the database.
- Used simple JDBC statements to persist the parsed values into Oracle tables.
- Worked on changes to the front-end java script pages.
- Developed core part of the application using Struts.

…
see more

positions.title: Java Developer
positions.companyName: Tata AIG General Insurance Company Limited
positions.description:
- Established Business analysis methodology around the Rational Unified Processes (RUP) which helped to develop Use cases, Project Plans and Managed Scope.
- Implemented MVC, Singleton, DAO, DTO J2EE design patterns as a part of application development.
- Created the JSP’s, Servlets, DOM, XSLT and Tag libraries for the Presentation layer.
- Integrated Crystal Reports with Alert Access application using JSP to display Dashboards and Audit Trails.
- Developed Few UI Screens with Adobe Flex where the columns are flexible and re-sizable with no page refreshing.

see more
